featured.text: Decorative or sticker bindis come in all sizes, colors and variations, and can be worn by young and old, married and unmarried people alike.
On the front apron, there is often a kilt pin, topped with a small decorative family symbol.

definition.zh_def: 裝飾性的，旨在美化或增添吸引力的。
definition.en_def: Serving to make something look more attractive or appealing.
definition.example: The decorative pillows added a pop of color to the living room.
